title: Fixes System.Xml.XmlException: For security reasons DTD is prohibited in this XML document

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. We will now review your pull request.
_Thanks,
Microsoft Pull Request Bot_

comments.author: mattleibow
daniel-luberda
comments.body:
Sure, I'll try to add it soon. Basically the exception occurs only only on some platforms (Release builds) when file has a DTD specified. 

```XML
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.1//EN"
  "http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/1.1/DTD/svg11.dtd">

<svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
    <rect x="10" y="10" height="100" width="100"
          style="stroke:#ff0000; fill: #0000ff"/>
</svg>
```
